content: you can make this design to be a sweet little scarflette to tie stylishly around your neck or a large cozy shawl to snuggle your whole self into just choose the yarn you love and use the hook size that makes fabric that feels good this project is so simple it s perfect for movie-watching or chatting with friends you can use any yarn you d like to make this project pictured here are malabrigo silky merino 1 and mirasol inka 2 it took 2 skeins of silky merino and one of inka with yarn held double divide the ball in half i used a us size g hook for both pictured samples 1 https //stixyarn com/products/silky-merino _pos=1&_sid=27356f030&_ss=r 2 https //stixyarn com/products/inka _pos=1&_sid=65c9333d8&_ss=r
